entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Matapedia

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
